The most common darvakkas are sykevers, walkers in the night. Bloodthirsty but calculating, they lead legions of dead into battle on the Material Plane, working toward the simple goal of ending all life. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Sykever](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1849) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 83 **Perception** +29; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) 60 feet **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Negative Energy Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +27, [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +6 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +7 --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +25 **Will** +31 **HP** 335 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10 **Weaknesses** [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83) 10, [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) 10 **Entropy's Shadow** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) 40 feet. Sykever leak entropy and corruption from their very being. A living creature entering or starting its turn in the aura takes 4d6 negative damage with a DC 33 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. If it fails, it's also [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute and [pulled](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 10 feet toward the skyever.
**Sunlight Powerlessness** A skyever caught in sunlight is [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3). --- **Speed** 40 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Melee** horn +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+12 bludgeoning plus 1d10 cold and 2d8 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Melee** arm spike +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+12 piercing plus 1d10 cold **Divine Innate Spells** DC 36 - **Cantrips (8th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **4th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (×3) - **6th** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) - **7th** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×3), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1); [Negative Energy Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=2); or [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) only) - **Constant (8th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Change Posture** The sykever changes between their bipedal and quadrupedal stance. In their bipedal stance, the sykever can use all the abilities in their stat block except Horned Rush. In their quadrupedal stance, the sykever has a Speed of 80 feet but can't make arm spike Strikes, Disarm, cast spells, or use Crush Item. **Crush Item** **Trigger** The sykever gets a critical success to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41); **Requirements** The sykever is in their bipedal stance; **Effect** The sykever snatches the item and pierces it with their arm spikes. The item becomes [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) and falls to the ground in the sykever's space. Items that are already broken aren't further damaged, and an item with 14 or higher Hardness is unaffected. **Draining Gaze** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The sykever fixes their nightmarish gaze on one creature they can see, who must attempt a DC 36 Will save. Regardless of the result, the target is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 round if the sykever is in bipedal stance, or [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 round if the sykever is in quadrupedal stance.
**Failure** As success, but the effect lasts 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** As success, but enfeebled 3 or clumsy 3, and the effect lasts 10 minutes. **Horned Rush** **Requirements** The sykever is in their quadrupedal stance; **Effect** The sykever Strides and then makes a horn Strike.
